title: Self-Regulated Science Learning Path Design in Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Scientific Concepts and Digital Device Usage Skills
context.additional_context: Designed for professionals to flexibly acquire science knowledge relevant to their work, offering personalized learning pathways tailored to individual learner characteristics.

learning_goals: Learners can establish individual learning goals using self-regulated learning strategies in digital learning environments.
Learners can acquire over 80% of the scientific knowledge required for their job roles by combining modular LMS-based content.
Learners revise their learning paths three or more times, incorporating peer feedback using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
